data.actual_result: they display in a random order
data.expected_result: The roles should display in order
data.steps_to_repro: -Make sure one of them is higher in permission than the others-Organise them and maybe colour them-Give yourself and a friend some roles, in different orders. E.g: Give them Mod, then Admin, then Member.-Notice one of the roles goes to the front of the list when it's not at the top of the roles
